channel.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)
channel.description:
so yestarday i had 21 people online but my mom turned pc off so when i tryed to register server again it was saying offline people connect through my ip (e.g) 90.3.764.217
help!

item.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

your ip may have changed, go make sure you ip matches the ip your using for no-ip

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)

item.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

use canyouseeme.org, type in 43594 as the port. If it doesn’t connect then you have to check to see if you ip has changed, which with canyouseeme.org it will have your ip right above in bold text. Next make sure your firewall allows incoming and outgoing packets, if that is fine make sure your ip is the same with the router, when you turn your computer off your router will reclaim the ip and most likely give you a new one when you reconnect to it, if it is different then configure your network adapter to manually set the ip, choose an ip that is at least 20 - 30 away from your other devices so it gives them room and doesn’t screw things up. If you did all that correctly your computer should be able to turn off and then reclaim the same ip every time.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)

item.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)

item.description:

i have got a new no-ip nothing is blocking it i need help lol 80 people play my servers +20 donors! helppp

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)
item.dc:creator: @rarffen rarffen
item.description:
@rarffen wrote:

calfool96:

ive check all of that, ive pf correctly otherwise people wouldnt have joined yestarday

yes but that may need to be changed now since your ip may have changed due to your mum turning the computer off.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)

item.title: Need help with connecting (who ever helps gets admin)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Then something else is blocking them, check your firewall to make sure the exception you added is still their. Also make sure if you have a dynamic ip you use no-ip.com for the DNS updating or else you will have to contentiously change the ip and create a new download link every time your ip changes.

Read full topic
